subTitle: Ask us all your questions about our brand and tool and machinery rental services, and get accurate answers.

faqs.question: What types of tools and machinery does A toda makina offer?
faqs.answer: A toda makina offers a wide range of tools and machinery for construction, renovation, and decoration projects. Our catalog includes hand tools, power tools, pneumatic tools, heavy and light machinery, and safety and protection equipment. Contact us for a complete list of products and services.

faqs.question: How can I rent tools and machinery from A toda makina?
faqs.answer: You can rent tools and machinery by contacting us by phone, email, or visiting our physical store. Our team of experts will help you select the right tools and machinery for your project and provide you with a personalized quote. We also offer delivery and pickup services for your convenience.

faqs.question: What discounts are available for frequent customers?
faqs.answer: We offer special discounts for frequent customers, including reduced rates for volume rentals and exclusive promotions on selected products and services. Our loyalty program allows you to accumulate points for each rental and redeem them for discounts on future transactions. Contact us for more information on how to join our loyalty program.

faqs.question: What should I do if a tool or machinery gets damaged during the rental?
faqs.answer: All our products are covered by a quality warranty and damage insurance. If a tool or machinery gets damaged during the rental, contact us immediately to report the issue and arrange for a repair or replacement. Our customer service team is available to assist you with any problems you may have.

faqs.question: Does A toda makina offer delivery and pickup services?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer delivery and pickup services for customers who cannot pick up their tools and machinery at our physical store. Our logistics team will deliver your tools and machinery to the agreed location and time, and pick them up once you have finished using them. Contact us for more information about our delivery and pickup services.

faqs.question: Does A toda makina offer rental services for large construction projects?
faqs.answer: Yes, our Enterprise Solutions are designed for large companies that need comprehensive tool and machinery rental services. We provide consultations, planning, and procurement of high-quality tools and materials, as well as staffing solutions for major construction needs. Contact us for a personalized quote.
